member.name: M:Unsplasharp.UnsplasharpClient.GetPhotoDownloadLink(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a single photo’s download link. Preferably hit this endpoint if a photo is downloaded in your application for use (example: to be displayed on a blog article, to be shared on social media, to be remixed, etc.).
